attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to KEEP the planned vehicle tracking and road pricing policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Come on we use the car far too much, anything that restricts its use should be welcomed. Polluters pay... simple. They pay for cleaning up our dirty cities, care for asthma suffers, environmental damage, stress, destroyed neighbourhoods where nothing remains but an out of town shopping centre... etc. It's not bashing the cars it's just being realistic and growing up a little.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
